refnamediv.refpurpose: Provide a label widget that connects to an epics channel.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: All options supported by the Tcl label widget are supported by this widget. You should not, however use the -textvariable option as this is used to connect the widget to the channel.

listitem.para: This option is required and can only be set at construction time. it provides the name of the epics channel to which the widget will be connected.

refsect1.title: METHODS
refsect1.para: All methods supported by the Tk label widget are supported by the epicsLabel widget.
